summary: The diff addresses REQ-1 by updating AdminGuard and Navigation components to include an email-based override for finproledge@gmail.com. Both components add ADMIN_EMAILS constant, localStorage email lookup, and combined backend+email admin check. However, the backend (backend/main.mo) is not modified, so the AC requiring the backend to return an admin role for this user's principal is not evidenced in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: The backend returns an admin role (or equivalent authorization) for the principal associated with finproledge@gmail.com.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to backend/main.mo are present in the diff. The backend isCallerAdmin() function is called but there is no evidence it was updated to recognize finproledge@gmail.com's principal as an admin. The fix relies entirely on frontend email override rather than the backend returning an admin role.

hallucinated_features.description: AdminEmailVerification component rendered when admin access is denied and profile is fetched, allowing the user to identify themselves via email entry stored in localStorage.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only asks for finproledge@gmail.com to be granted access via email override, backend role check, and navigation visibility. An interactive email verification/self-identification flow with localStorage persistence was not requested.
